title: All records containing the search term "Prairie View"

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Colorado Open Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Any and all 2003-2016 records pertaining to the Prairie View Ranch subdivision's water system in Morgan County Colorado.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Anonymous natural person(s)

Dear FBI:

This is a request for records under the Freedom of Information Act. 

RECORDS REQUESTED

Please produce all records related to Dr. Ruth Westheimer, the sex advice therapist. She was born in Frankfurt, Germany on June 4, 1928 and died on July 12, 2024 in Manhattan.

OTHER NAMES USED

The subject was born Karola Ruth Siegel.

PROOF OF DEATH:

Dr. Westheimer's news obituary from the Washington Post is attached.

SCOPE OF SEARCH:

In addition to standard practices, please search the Electronic Surveillance (ELSUR) Indices, the Microphone Surveillance (MISUR) Indices, the Physical Surveillance (FISUR) Indices, and the Technical Surveillance (TESUR) Indices.

FORM OF PRODUCTION

I would prefer that you produce responsive records electronically, by email attachment if available or on CD-ROM if not.

Thank you very much.
